properties.title: Via Ferrata climbing trails/Rope Park
properties.abstract: With its five exciting via ferrata trails and a rope park Engelberg is a genuine Eldorado for climbing fans. Up you go. - to breathtaking heights and fantastic views.
properties.description:
Via ferrata climbing trails: Interested in a closer look at that magnificent mountain terrain? Follow the via ferrata climbing trails. Beginner climbers can discover the fascination of outdoor climbing, while enjoying the natural surroundings and areas that most don't have access to. Expert climbers get their thrills, too: vertical rock walls promise challenging climbs. Three different climbing outfitters are ready and waiting to assist you with your first climbing experience. Equipment is available from local sports stores.

Rope Park: Action-packed and open—that's the Rope Park in Engelberg's Schlänggen Forest. The park offers six parcourses of varied degrees of difficulty. There are balancing bridges, Nepalese hanging walks, and swinging Tyrolliennes. Experienced Outventure guides provide comprehensive safety instruction and make sure that the facilties and riggings are safe. Rental equipment is available on site, and instruction is included in the price of admission.
properties.name: Engelberg-Titlis Tourismus AG
